text:
Hello,
I have a general question!
Is there any advantage in using the same information as one-dimensional array(i.e., Vector) over Two-dimensional array(i.e.,Matrix).

elements.text:
Hello,
I have a general question!
Is there any advantage in using the same information as one-dimensional array(i.e., Vector) over Two-dimensional array(i.e.,Matrix).

text: Internally, both are stored al one-dimensional array, the column of the matrices are stacked on topof one another. So there is not much difference for the memory layout, it's just a different interface so it depends what you want to do with it. Bit it's just usability, not performance.

elements.text: Internally, both are stored al one-dimensional array, the column of the matrices are stacked on topof one another. So there is not much difference for the memory layout, it's just a different interface so it depends what you want to do with it. Bit it's just usability, not performance.
